name: Among Them Guy RPG [Demo]
description:
- Controls -
Arrow Keys to move

Space to select action commands

Note: This is a school project, none of this should be taken seriously.

- Soundtrack -

The official OST can be found here:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkwayGrE5a6V7KC55Hzy2gZW8EoE0hb2

- Join the Discord community! -

https://discord.gg/huCeqNtxZj

- Lore -
AmonGuy the Third, has defeated the infamous Low Tier God in a match of Street Fighter V! LowTierGod rages, and doxxes our hero and captures his mother. Help AmonGuy collect chaos emeralds, fight off NFT Monkeys, and travel across various worlds to fight LowTierGod.

- Staff -

Coding, Soundtrack, Sprites - Alex [besu_ssb]

Graphics, Character Concepts - Mikey [MikeySama]

In-Game Mechanics - Jahlan [Jahamez / Spicy]
